name: suspend
signature: <RIn, E, ROut>(evaluate: LazyArg<Layer<ROut, E, RIn>>) => Layer<ROut, E, RIn>
description:
Lazily constructs a layer. This is useful to avoid infinite recursion when
creating layers that refer to themselves.
documentation:
Lazily constructs a layer. This is useful to avoid infinite recursion when
creating layers that refer to themselves.
